text: The BRIT Awards (often called just the Brits), are awards given yearly by the British Phonographic Industry (an association of British people who are professionally involved in the recorded music industry) for outstanding work in music. ==Most successful acts== There have been many musicians that have won more than one award. The table below shows those that have won more than four awards. Artist Number of awards won Robbie Williams 17 U2 7 Take That 8 Coldplay 8 Prince 5 Arctic Monkeys 5 Oasis 5 Michael Jackson 6 Annie Lennox 8 Blur 5 == Other websites == *Official site Category:Music awards
title: BRIT Awards
